name: NEProxyServer
desc: NEProxyServer contains settings for a proxy server.

items.name: var address: String
items.desc: The address of the proxy server.

items.name: var port: Int
items.desc: The TCP port on which the proxy server is listening for connections.

items.name: var authenticationRequired: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating if the server requires authentication credentials.

items.name: var username: String?
items.desc: The username portion of the authentication credential to be used to authenticate with the proxy server.

items.name: var password: String?
items.desc: The password portion of the authentication credential to be used to authenticate with the proxy server.
